channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 29th October
item.description:
Letter received in the post on 28/10/2025 - copy attached. Customer reports that branches from a tree at the location are endangering their property. Please see 2009 letter included in correspondence.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 29th October
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level difference 2040x340x27mm tarmac patch required stats required no parking cones required prior to works (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -other CW6 problem, 29th October
item.description:

item.title: Van parked in public parking area. Numberplates removed, 29th October
item.description:
This is the public parking area leading into the estate on St.Johns Ave Churchdown
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southfield Court, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Two blocked drains, 29th October
item.description:
Outside No6 Whitehart Street, Cheltenham...... either side of the road there are two blocked drains.
